title: Neon Drift Legends
description: Neon Drift Legends is a high-speed, synthwave-infused racing game set in a futuristic city. Master tight corners, build your drift combo, and climb the online leaderboards under glowing neon skies.
features: Stylized neon cityscapes and synthwave soundtrack
Car customization with visual and performance upgrades
minSpecs: CPU: Intel Core i3-4130 / AMD FX-4100, RAM: 8 GB, GPU: NVIDIA GTX 750 Ti / AMD R7 360, Storage: 20 GB
recommendedSpecs: CPU: Intel Core i5-4570 / AMD Ryzen 5 1400, RAM: 16 GB, GPU: NVIDIA GTX 1060 / AMD RX 580, Storage: 25 GB SSD

title: Starfall Tactics: Armada
description: Starfall Tactics: Armada is a real-time strategy game where you design fleets, outmaneuver enemy commanders, and control key sectors of a dynamic galaxy map filled with hazards and secrets.
features: Real-time tactical fleet battles in space
Ship design with modular components and loadouts
Dynamic galaxy map with shifting control and events
Online skirmishes and ranked multiplayer modes
minSpecs: CPU: Intel Core i3-6100 / AMD FX-6300, RAM: 8 GB, GPU: NVIDIA GTX 750 / AMD R7 260X, Storage: 25 GB
recommendedSpecs: CPU: Intel Core i5-8400 / AMD Ryzen 5 2600, RAM: 16 GB, GPU: NVIDIA GTX 1060 / AMD RX 580, Storage: 30 GB SSD

title: Echoes of Aether
description: Echoes of Aether is an action RPG set in a shattered world where time fractures in combat. Chain abilities across timelines, forge powerful relics, and uncover the truth behind the collapsing realms.

title: Grand Theft Auto VI
description: Grand Theft Auto VI brings players back to the neon-soaked streets of Leonida, inspired by modern-day Vice City. Featuring multiple protagonists, an evolving open world, and Rockstarâ€™s most ambitious storytelling yet, GTA 6 delivers a dynamic crime saga set in a sprawling and immersive sandbox.
features: Massive open world spanning Vice City and surrounding regions
Multiple playable characters with intersecting stories
Dynamic AI, weather systems, and real-time world evolution
GTA Online 2.0 with expanded multiplayer and live events
minSpecs: CPU: Intel Core i7-8700 / AMD Ryzen 5 3600, RAM: 16 GB, GPU: NVIDIA GTX 1660 Ti / AMD RX 5600 XT, Storage: 150 GB SSD
recommendedSpecs: CPU: Intel Core i9-9900K / AMD Ryzen 7 5800X, RAM: 32 GB, GPU: NVIDIA RTX 3080 / AMD RX 6800 XT, Storage: 150 GB NVMe SSD
